name: Zig Zag Up
description:
>>> Zig Zag Up the most incredible and addictive game of 2017 .

Do as mang zigzag as possible !

Touch the screen to change the direction of the line .

Zig Zag Up is very addictive game. We are sure you will not stop playing . So play at your own risk.

How far can you go ?


Enjoy !
